name: Student_Attendance_Tracking
description: Website for an instructor to Manage Student Attendance. Profissor can check the Attendance percentage of the Student or can even manually mark/unmark Attendance for a particula student. The core functionality of this application is generation of a 'QR code', which can be scanned by a student from an IOS device  to mark attendance for a particular subject
author: Vamsi Devalla
